about_the_game:
Little Fighters on Stream is a compilation of mini games in which you can play directly with the Twitch chat on your stream using commands. It features a growing selection of accion, skill and memorization mini-games in which you'll have to run, hit, throw and more with your Twitch chat.

The chat can play using commands that are specified in the lobby of each mini game, while the streamer executes the game and transmits it, showing to the chat with a little transmission delay, his situation within the game.

  • Mini-games, each of them with specific rules, rhythm and funny interactions.

  • 9 very varied mini-games (soon a new game) for you to play with your stream chat (we're always adding new games)

  • Fun design of characters, locations and environments.

  • Items, in case you need more action and frenzy.

  • Diviértete con tu comunidad de twitch!

Little Fighters on Stream is a game designed for interaction and fun.

The minigames that we have finished are:

Struggle: Is a wrestling game where players will fight a battle with the other participants. (Viewers vs Viewers)

Where it Gone?: Will test your memory and speed to remember tiles. (All vs All)

Juegardo: It is a competition where participants must throw the hoop. (Viewers vs IA)

Explosive Paint: The streamer draws a secret word and the chat must guess it or everything will explode. (Viewers vs Streamer)

Escape: The Killer Swuid: The chat must reach the goal, however if you move in the red light, you will die. (Viewers vs IA)

Boats: The boat with the most people will be eliminated. (Viewers vs Viewers )

Penalties: Chat throw the ball and the streamer must catch it, FOOTBALL! (Viewers vs Streamer)

Lucky Weel: It's a simple roulette to generate a winner. (Viewers vs IA)

Crazy Cars: A crazy car race full of obstacles and curves in which the vehicles must reach the finish line. (Viewers vs IA)

{STEAM_APP_IMAGE}/extras/Delay.png

All mini games are designed with transmission delay in mind. This won't be a problem because all the mini games have a comfortable response time. Try it and you'll see it.

name: Little Fighters on Stream

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Dual Core
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: integrated graphics
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Onboard
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Dual core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Ati Radeon HD 4850 or NVIDIA GeForce 9600GT
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Onboard

short_description: Little Fighters on Stream is a compilation of action, skill and memorization mini games in which you can play directly with the Twitch chat on your stream using simple commands.
supported_languages:
English*, Spanish - Spain
*languages with full audio support
